participant_1.name: Logan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, enjoys exploring new places and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn more about animals and the environment. I am in the military. I'm from Seattle. I enjoy learning about other cultures.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, loves crafting and spending time with friends and family.
participant_2.background: My previous job was as a seamstress, and I used to love creating custom quilts for my customers. I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life. I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future. I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe. I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.

content.text: I am a military brat, so I've been all over the country. What's it like living in your hometown?
I love it! I have a great group of friends and family here, and I love the sense of community.
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love to go bowling and play video games. I also like to go out to eat with my friends.
Have you ever been to Australia? I hear it's a beautiful country.
I've never been, but I'd love to go someday! I hear the people are really friendly and the food is amazing.
Maybe we can go together sometime! I'm sure it would be a lot of fun.
That would be great! I'd love to travel with you.
What do you think about learning about different cultures?
I think it's really important! It helps us to understand different perspectives and ways of life.
I agree! I love learning about new cultures and meeting new people.
Me too! It's one of the best parts of traveling.

I love reading about animals and the environment, so I like to visit websites that have information about those topics. I also like to stay up-to-date on current events, so I'll read articles from news websites.
I like those websites too! I also like to read about history and culture.
Those are great topics to learn about! I love learning about how people from different cultures live
